title: Love Your Codebase
content: F# is like an antiphlogistic for the mind. Anf if you'll forgive my Haiku: | Arctic blue for months | A vivid, crystal aurora scintillates | hygge from F#

title: Holy Bolero!
content: Develop SPAs with the full power of F# and .NET. Full-stack web development sanity, Look Ma, no JS! Think of the children.

title: Pleasant Dev Experience
content: I enjoyed every part of it, as did I Websharper. Blazor and .NET liberated by F#. Elegant simple routing. Never used Elm but love the Elmish flow. Wonderful separation of design & layout with HTML Templates.
